TagReference.name: CAN'T USE
TagReference.description: set me!! me!!! i do something cool!!! you'll be happy forever if there this tag reference is filled in! don't believe the lies!!! LIESSSS!!!!!!!! YESS, MY PRECIOUSSSSS, LIESSSS...

Bit.name: cortana hack
Bit.description: sort cortana in front of other transparent geometry

Bit.name: always draw sky
Bit.description: always draw sky 0, even if no +sky polygons are visible

Bit.name: don't strip pathfinding
Bit.description: always leave pathfinding in, even for a multiplayer scenario

Bit.name: DO NOT apply bungie MP tag patches
Bit.description: Inhibit the Auto-Update 3 (April 18, 2005) balance patch changes from the final multiplayer map

Bit.name: scripted
Bit.description: the level script will set this value; the other settings here will be ignored.

Bit.name: invert
Bit.description: result of function is one minus actual result

Bit.name: always active
Bit.description: function does not deactivate when at or below lower bound

Real.name: period
Real.description: this is the period for the above function (lower values make the function oscillate quickly, higher values make it oscillate slowly)

ShortBlockIndex.name: scale period by
ShortBlockIndex.description: multiply this function by the above period

ShortBlockIndex.name: scale function by
ShortBlockIndex.description: multiply this function by the result of the above function

ShortEnum.name: wobble function
ShortEnum.description: the curve used for the wobble

Real.name: wobble period
Real.description: the length of time it takes for the magnitude of this function to complete a wobble

Real.name: wobble magnitude
Real.description: the amount of random wobble in the magnitude

RealFraction.name: square wave threshold
RealFraction.description: if non-zero, all values above the square wave threshold are snapped to 1.0, and all values below it are snapped to 0.0 to create a square wave.

ShortInteger.name: step count
ShortInteger.description: the number of discrete values to snap to (e.g., a step count of 5 would snap the function to 0.00,0.25,0.50,0.75 or 1.00)

ShortInteger.name: sawtooth count
ShortInteger.description: the number of times this function should repeat (e.g., a sawtooth count of 5 would give the function a value of 1.0 at each of 0.25,0.50,0.75 as well as at 1.0

ShortBlockIndex.name: scale result by
ShortBlockIndex.description: multiply this function (from a weapon, vehicle, etc.) final result of all of the above math

ShortEnum.name: bounds mode
ShortEnum.description: controls how the bounds, below, are used

ShortBlockIndex.name: turn off with
ShortBlockIndex.description: if the specified function is off, so is this function

Explanation.name: dynamic spawn
Explanation.description: non-zero values here overload what appears in multiplayer_globals

Explanation.name: static spawn zones
Explanation.description: lower and upper height can be left at zero, in which case they use the defaults. leaving relevant teams empty means all teams, leaving all games empty means all games

Explanation.name: WARNING
Explanation.description: Editing fog palette data will not behave as expected with split scenarios

Explanation.name: WARNING
Explanation.description: Editing fog palette data will not behave as expected with split scenarios
